title: Dreams

sentences.e18e: SPIRITS BY THE LAKE — PALETTE KNIFE Oil Painting On Canvas By Leonid Afremov

author: Violet
content: Dreams Take my hand Pull me into Your dreams Show me your world Let me touch Your vibrant colors That you keep Close to your heart Share them with me So I may drink in The lusciousness of your soul And drown in your arms SPIRITS BY THE LAKE — PALETTE KNIFE Oil Painting On Canvas By Leonid Afremov
